description: This file contains a React component that handles OAuth callback redirects from backend authentication providers (Jira and Confluence). It parses URL parameters, updates the client-side router to redirect the user appropriately, and provides a user interface during redirection.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouter
methods.description: Main component that renders a Suspense boundary and the inner OAuth callback handler.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouterInner
methods.description: Handles extracting URL parameters and performing client-side redirection based on provider and status.
